summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 FORD EXPLORER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE PARKED, IT BECAME DIFFICULT TO SHIFT GEARS. THE VEHICLE WAS ALSO SLIPPING GEARS WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING THREE DIFFERENT TIMES. THE TECHNICIANS WERE UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE THE FAILURE. THERE WAS AN INVESTIGATION UNDER NHTSA ACTION NUMBER: EA09013 (POWER TRAIN: AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION: LEVER AND LINKAGE: COLUMN SHIFT STEERING: COLUMN STEERING: COLUMN LOCKING: ANTI-THEFT DEVICE POWER TRAIN: AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION: GEAR POSITION INDICATION (PRNDL)) THAT MAY BE RELATED TO THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED.  THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 146,000.   UPDATED 11/28/12 *CN
